SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client

Interface GameManagementInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI, ClientTCP
public interface GameManagementInterface
The interface is implemented by all clients independently by their connection type (RMI or TCP). It aims to create a common way that the client can use to interact in the network. By using common methods both for RMI and socket, a higher level of abstraction can be obtained, without requiring to create different methods for RMI and socket in the methods that needs to interact with the network.

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      void createGame(String gameName, int numPlayers)
      The method is used to create a new game with the given name and number of players.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game that will be created.
      numPlayers - The number of players to play with.

    • createGame

      void createGame(String gameName, int numPlayers, int seed)
      The method is used to create a new game with the given name, number of players and seed.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game that will be created.
      numPlayers - The number of players for the game.
      seed - The seed for the game.

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(String gameName)
      The method is used to join a game with the given game name.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to join.

    • joinFirstAvailableGame

      void joinFirstAvailableGame()
      The method is used to join the first available game.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(String cardToInsert, String anchorCard, Direction directionToInsert, CardOrientation orientation)
      The method is used to send a request to place a card in the personal table.
      Parameters:
      cardToInsert - the card that needs to be placed.
      anchorCard - the card from which to place the card.
      directionToInsert - the direction from the anchorCard in which player wants to place the card.
      orientation - the orientation in which player wants to place cardToInsert.

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(ArrayList<String> UsersToSend, String messageToSend)
      The method is used to send a message to the chat.
      Parameters:
      UsersToSend - a list containing the nickname of the users to whom player wants to send the message.
      messageToSend - the message player wants to send.

    • placeInitialCard

      void placeInitialCard(CardOrientation cardOrientation)
      The method is used to place the initial card at the beginning of the game.
      Parameters:
      cardOrientation - the orientation in which player wants to place the initial card.

    • pickCardFromTable

      void pickCardFromTable(PlayableCardType type, int position)
      The method is used to pick a card from the common table.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of card player wants to pick (RESOURCE/GOLD).
      position - the position in the table player wants to take the card from.

    • pickCardFromDeck

      void pickCardFromDeck(PlayableCardType type)
      The method is used to pick a card from a deck.

      To choose the private goal card at the beginning of the game.
      Parameters:
